content: easy cable scarf caston21stitches ● row 1 rs k4 p2 k9 p2 k4 ● row2 ws k3 p1 k2 p9 k2 p1 k3 ● row3 rs cablerow k4 p2 placethefirst3stitchesonacableneedleandhold themtotheback k3stitchesfromtheleftneedle thenk3stitchesfromthecable needle k3 p2 k4 ● row4 ws k3 p1 k2 p9 k2 p1 k3 ● row5 rs k4 p2 k9 p2 k4 ● row6 ws k3 p1 k2 p9 k2 p1 k3 ● row7 rs cablerow k4 p2 k3 placethenext3stitchesonacableneedleand holdthemtothefront k3 thenk3stitchesfromthecableneedle p2 k4 ● row8 ws k3 p1 k2 p9 k2 p1 k3 repeatrows1 8foryourdesiredlength i used the same pattern with much thinner yarn and made a headband with it be creative and have fun 😀
